name: kiuwan
label: Kiuwan
description: Kiuwan is a software as a service (SaaS) static application security testing multi-technology software for software analysis, code quality, software composition and security measurement/management. This connector facilitates automated operations related to Action Plan, Analyses, and Defect.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the username used to access the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password used to access the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the current and the past main metrics and indicators of an application for an action plan from Kiuwan based on the application name, action plan name, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the progress summary for the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the progress summary for the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve the progress summary from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve the progress summary from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve the progress summary for the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve the progress summary for the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Defects List for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all defects included in the specified action plan from Kiuwan based on the application name, action plan name, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan based on the application name, action plan name, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve pending defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve pending defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Label
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the analysis label using which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisLabel
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the analysis label using which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve pending defects for the action plan in Kiuwan. Possible values are: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: File Contains
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the file using which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: fileContains
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the name of the file using which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.
parameters.name: priorities
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the option based on which you want to filter the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the option based on which you want to filter the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan in the ascending order.
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan in the ascending order.

operations.title: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the removed defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan based on the application name, action plan name, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve removed defects for the action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve removed defects for the action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve removed defects for the action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve removed defects for the action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Label
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the analysis label using which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan. Note: If you do not specify the analysis label, then the operation compares it with the last analysis.
parameters.name: analysisLabel
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the analysis label using which you want to retrieve pending defects of the specified action plan from Kiuwan. Note: If you do not specify the analysis label, then the operation compares it with the last analysis.

operations.title: Get Available Action Plans
operations.description: Retrieves the list of action plans of the specified application from Kiuwan based on the application name you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve action plans from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve action plans from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Analysis List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all analyses or specific analyses from Kiuwan based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Audit Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the status of the audit using which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL. Note: This parameter applies only to analysis that has audits.
parameters.name: audit_status
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the status of the audit using which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL. Note: This parameter applies only to analysis that has audits.

parameters.title: Deliveries
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results retrieved from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: deliveries
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results retrieved from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: start_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: end_date
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say analysis starting from the 10th analysis. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say analysis starting from the 10th analysis. By default, this is set as 1.

operations.title: Get Analysis Codes List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of analysis codes for the specified application from Kiuwan based on the application name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis codes from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis codes from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Purged Analyses
parameters.description: Select this option if you do not want to filter the purged analyses retrieved from Kiuwan. By default, it is set to True.
parameters.name: filterPurgedAnalyses
parameters.tooltip: Select this option if you do not want to filter the purged analyses retrieved from Kiuwan. By default, it is set to True.

parameters.title: Success
parameters.description: Select the option if you want to retrieve succeeded analysis code from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: success
parameters.tooltip: Select the option if you want to retrieve succeeded analysis code from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

operations.title: Get Latest Analysis Files List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of files with metric values and defects of the latest analysis for the named application from Kiuwan based on the application name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the latest analysis files from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the latest analysis files from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Latest Analysis
operations.description: Retrieves the last analysis for the authenticated user and the application indicated from Kiuwan based on the application name you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the latest analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve the latest analysis from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Application Analysis
operations.description: Retrieves the analysis results for a concrete analysis from Kiuwan based on the application name you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve application analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve application analysis from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Analysis Defects List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all analysis defects for a concrete analysis specified by code parameter from Kiuwan based on the analysis code and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve analysis defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve analysis defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve analysis defects from Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve analysis defects from Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: File Contains
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the file using which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: fileContains
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the name of the file using which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mutes
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the mutes based using which you want to filter defects by their mute status in Kiuwan
parameters.name: muted
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the mutes based using which you want to filter defects by their mute status in Kiuwan

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.
parameters.name: priorities
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say analysis starting from the 10th analysis. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say analysis starting from the 10th analysis. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the option based on which you want to filter the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select the option based on which you want to filter the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan in the ascending order.
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan in the ascending order.

operations.title: Get Comparison Defects
operations.description: Retrieves a net number of new and removed defects and violated rules after comparing two given analyses from Kiuwan based on the analysis code and previous analysis code you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Previous Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan
parameters.name: prev_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan

operations.title: Get New/Removed Defects List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of new/removed defects in an analysis from the previous analysis from Kiuwan based on the analysis code and previous analysis code and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Previous Analysis Code
parameters.description: SSpecify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan
parameters.name: prev_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan

parameters.title: Defect Type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the defect based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defectstype
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the defect based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan..

operations.title: Get Files Defects Details
operations.description: Retrieves files with metric values and defects for a specific analysis from Kiuwan based on the analysis code you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to retrieve file defect details from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to retrieve file defect details from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Delete Analysis
operations.description: Delete details of specific analysis from Kiuwan based on the analysis code that you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysis_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.

operations.title: Create Mutes for Rule or File
operations.description: Create a mute for a rule/file in Kiuwan based on the application name and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mute for a rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mute for a rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comment that you want to associate with the mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the comment that you want to associate with the mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: File Name
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mute in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_name
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mute in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: File Pattern
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of file patterns for which you want to create a mute for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_pattern
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of file patterns for which you want to create a mute for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Rule
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mute for the rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: rule
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mute for the rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mute Reason
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the reason for which you want to create a mute for the rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
parameters.name: reason
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the reason for which you want to create a mute for the rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.

operations.title: Create Suppresion Rule
operations.description: Create a suppression rule in Kiuwan based on the defect ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to create the suppression rule in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to create the suppression rule in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comment that you want to associate with the suppression rule that you want to create in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the comment that you want to associate with the suppression rule that you want to create in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mute By
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the mute for which you want to create a suppression rule in Kiuwan. You can choose either LINE_NUMBER or SOURCE_CODE.
parameters.name: muteBy
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the mute for which you want to create a suppression rule in Kiuwan. You can choose either LINE_NUMBER or SOURCE_CODE.

parameters.title: Mute Reason
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the reason for which you want to create a suppression rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
parameters.name: reason
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the reason for which you want to create a suppression rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.

operations.title: Get Defect Notes
operations.description: Retrieve a list of notes associated with the specified defect from Kiuwan based on the defect ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to retrieve defect notes from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to retrieve defect notes from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Violated Rules
operations.description: Retrieves a list of violated rules of analysis for the authenticated user from Kiuwan based on the application name and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisCode
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Code Security
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option if you want to retrieve code security with violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: onlyCodeSecurity
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option if you want to retrieve code security with violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a comma-separated list of languages using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.description: (Optional) Select a priority using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select a priority using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can specify the following values: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

parameters.title: Tag
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a tag using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a tag using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Vulnerability Type
parameters.description: (Optional) Select a type of vulnerability using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Permissions, Privileges and Access Controls, Injection, Error Handling and Fault Isolation, Other, Encryption and Randomness, Misconfiguration, Design Error, Initialization and Shutdown, Control Flow Management, File Handling, Number Handling, System Element Isolation, Buffer Handling, Information Leaks, Pointer, or Reference Handling.
parameters.name: vuln_type
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select a type of vulnerability using which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Permissions, Privileges and Access Controls, Injection, Error Handling and Fault Isolation, Other, Encryption and Randomness, Misconfiguration, Design Error, Initialization and Shutdown, Control Flow Management, File Handling, Number Handling, System Element Isolation, Buffer Handling, Information Leaks, Pointer, or Reference Handling.

operations.title: Get Violated Rule Files
operations.description: Retrieves a list of files that are affected by violated rules from Kiuwan based on the application name, analysis code, and rule code you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisCode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Rule Code
parameters.description: Specify the rule code for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: ruleCode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rule code for which you want to retrieve violated rule files from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get File Defects
operations.description: Retrieves a list of defects in a file for a concrete violated rule from Kiuwan based on the application name, analysis code, file name, and rule code you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisCode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: File Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file including the path for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the file including the path for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Rule Code
parameters.description: Specify the rule code for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: ruleCode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rule code for which you want to retrieve file defects from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Update Defect Status
operations.description: Updates the status of the specified defect in Kiuwan based on the defect ID, status, and optionally an associated note you have specified.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to update the defect status in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to update the defect status in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Select the status that you want to update for the specified defect in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, TO_REVIEW, or REVIEWED.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status that you want to update for the specified defect in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, TO_REVIEW, or REVIEWED.

parameters.title: Note
parameters.description: (Optional) Add a note that you want to associate with the specified defect that you want to update in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: note
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Add a note that you want to associate with the specified defect that you want to update in Kiuwan.
